Class PathFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • screen.ScreenObject
      • items.Item
        • items.PathFinder

  • public class PathFinder
extends Item
    Represents an item that finds the path from the officer to the nearest blueprint.
    Author:
    Dhruv Lohani

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet marker,
                 double x,
                 double y,
                 double w,
                 double h)
        Draws the shortest path.
        Parameters:
        marker - the PApplet which the shortest path is draw upon.
        x - the upper left x coordinate of the marker
        y - the upper left y coordinate of the marker
        w - the width of the marker
        h - the height of the marker
